__e: All right, a shoe box, don't let it get away!
Apparently someone stole his shoebox and he thought it was me.
And you are not gonna sleep in a cardboard box... 'cause you haven't heard my great idea.
Come to think of it, a man brought a cardboard box.
I left it in a cardboard box on his desk. There's no card, just the words "Open now," which I wrote with my wrong hand so he wouldn't recognize my handwriting.
It was just... It was a box of stuff.
Haven't we got a box of these somewhere? Taylor's?
I just see he's he's... he's got a cellphone box in his hand.
- Yes, I just don't know which draw it's in.
But you took that because there's a part of you... that knows that this... That box... is your real father.

Yeah, I found this in a box of your things.
I have a box of her things in my apartment.

A box with everything I need.
- I didn't do it. I have a box here with everyone's name in it!
Yeah, I never got the hang of it, but I still got a boxful of his.
Not while the Black Box is out there.

Did you give her the money or the box that I made her?
